about_the_game:
■ Go outdoors to gather inspiration, then return home and transform your newfound insights into captivating stories.

■ Take control of the narrative's direction by selecting pivotal plot branches that lead to your desired endings. Use Steam Workshop to add your own customized stories!

■ School, showbiz, ABO, fantasy, etc... a vast array of AUs await you, along with numerous story tags including Fluff, Angst, Funny, and Hurt/Comfort.

■ In order to captivate your readers and expand your fan base, it’s also important to grasp popular trends. Fulfill commissioned requests and gather inspiration across diverse categories!

■ As your blorbo’s world’s first stan, don’t forget to customize your beloved character!

■ Embrace the freedom to personalize your blorbo in every detail, including physical appearance and personality traits, which will later influence their actions and dialogue throughout the narrative.



■ Here comes a world of merchandise and gacha delights! With the extensive collection of merch and decorations, you can decorate your room to reflect your unique fan aesthetics.

■ Designing personalized ita-bags, showcasing your devotion to your favorite characters, and capturing memorable moments with your merchandise through captivating photographs... Pretty much to do in your fangirl life!

■ Create your own freebie at the crafting station! Unlock stickers and illusts, increase your hand-crafting level and unleash your imagination!

■ Showcase your freebies on your wall or ita-bag, or exchange them with fellow fans! You may also receive gifts while outing.

■ During your time in the fandom, you will meet four distinct fellow fans.

■ Your unwavering companion in the niche corners of fandom. The encouraging event organizer in love with your work. The enigmatic and influential goddess writer. And your seemingly-aggresive anti-fan.

■ United by a shared passion, together you will embark on a journey of camaraderie and shared experiences within the vibrant fan culture community!

■ The last boss is finally here! Culminate your passion in self-published fanzines and prepare for the comic convention!

■ Time to set up your booth as a vendor. Choose your fanzines, merch and decoration. Sell fanzines with speed & precision!

■ Planning your route and zero in on popular booths—race with time as a customer! Will you get what you want?

■ On the grand year-end Comic-Con event “CT30”, unveil your creations, connect with fellow fans, and share your passion with the world!

Things we have because of love
Stories we created because of love
People we met because of love
"This is a love letter... to all fan girls."

*Feel free to upload gameplay videos or livestream the game!

highlighted.name: Thank You for Being by My Side

detailed_description:
ROADMAP


About the Game

■ Go outdoors to gather inspiration, then return home and transform your newfound insights into captivating stories.

■ Take control of the narrative's direction by selecting pivotal plot branches that lead to your desired endings. Use Steam Workshop to add your own customized stories!

■ School, showbiz, ABO, fantasy, etc... a vast array of AUs await you, along with numerous story tags including Fluff, Angst, Funny, and Hurt/Comfort.

■ In order to captivate your readers and expand your fan base, it’s also important to grasp popular trends. Fulfill commissioned requests and gather inspiration across diverse categories!

■ As your blorbo’s world’s first stan, don’t forget to customize your beloved character!

■ Embrace the freedom to personalize your blorbo in every detail, including physical appearance and personality traits, which will later influence their actions and dialogue throughout the narrative.



■ Here comes a world of merchandise and gacha delights! With the extensive collection of merch and decorations, you can decorate your room to reflect your unique fan aesthetics.

■ Designing personalized ita-bags, showcasing your devotion to your favorite characters, and capturing memorable moments with your merchandise through captivating photographs... Pretty much to do in your fangirl life!

■ Create your own freebie at the crafting station! Unlock stickers and illusts, increase your hand-crafting level and unleash your imagination!

■ Showcase your freebies on your wall or ita-bag, or exchange them with fellow fans! You may also receive gifts while outing.

■ During your time in the fandom, you will meet four distinct fellow fans.

■ Your unwavering companion in the niche corners of fandom. The encouraging event organizer in love with your work. The enigmatic and influential goddess writer. And your seemingly-aggresive anti-fan.

■ United by a shared passion, together you will embark on a journey of camaraderie and shared experiences within the vibrant fan culture community!

■ The last boss is finally here! Culminate your passion in self-published fanzines and prepare for the comic convention!

■ Time to set up your booth as a vendor. Choose your fanzines, merch and decoration. Sell fanzines with speed & precision!

■ Planning your route and zero in on popular booths—race with time as a customer! Will you get what you want?

■ On the grand year-end Comic-Con event “CT30”, unveil your creations, connect with fellow fans, and share your passion with the world!

Things we have because of love
Stories we created because of love
People we met because of love
"This is a love letter... to all fan girls."

*Feel free to upload gameplay videos or livestream the game!
legal_notice:
All stories, characters, organizations, place names, products, services, and activities that appear in this game are fictional. Any resemblance to reaentities is purely coincidental.
This game and Steam Workshop offer custom character creation and desktop arrangement features. Players can use custom components or materials within the gameto freely match, build, create, and design characters, setups, and arrangements (hereinafter referred to as "simulated content".)
The simulated content feature is intended to simulate fan activities and enhance player immersion. To ensure a comfortable and enjoyable gaming experience for all players, please follow these guidelines:

The game only provides customizable components and generation feature that can constitute simulated content, which is only for personal use inside the game. You are responsible for any third-party complaints or claims arising from your simulated content.
Please do not use simulated content for any profit-making activities, whether directiy using the components or utilizing the completed simulated content.
Please do not express any illegal, offensive, infringing, discriminatory, or otherwise unpleasant content in the simulated content. Do not include personalinformation or post such content online.
Simulated content you create in the game may not be liked by others, and you may not like other players' simulated content. This is normal. If you encounter such situations in online interactions, you can simply ignore or close them. We wish you maintain a pleasant mood both in and out of the game.

Additionally, all intellectual property rights of the game characters, articles, designs, music, and other game materials provided within the game remain with the game developer.

  • Processor: 2.8 GHz intel
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600/9600GT

  • Processor: 2.8 GHz intel

  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: i5-4440 (3.1 GHz quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 DirectX
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Sensei! I like you so much! is a fandom business simulation game. You will play as a fanfic author, create fanfic of all genres, release your fanzine, join comicons, gather followers, and become a legend. In the meantime, buy goods of your pairing, build itabags, and decorate your room.
